name: Role Player: Full Immersion
description:
Role Player is an Interactive movie game, you have to choose options and decide the fate of the main character. Our hero loves to play RPG games on the topic of technological disasters and post-Apocalypse, but he wants more entourage and adrenaline! Let's see how he`ll like it)

Role Player is an Interactive movie game, you have to choose options and decide the fate of the main character. Our hero loves to play RPG games on the topic of technological disasters and post-Apocalypse, but he wants more entourage and adrenaline! Let's see how he`ll like it)

Rolevik's plot will transport you to a parallel universe, where in the exclusion zone of the Chernobyl nuclear power plant will happen an accident. Moreover, you will have to choose how to act in this hazardous environment. Do not forget that at the very beginning of our story, you have no idea of your location. Our hero strangely transports from 2020 back to 2004, you will find out the rest, and most importantly - the choice is always yours.

Game features:

1. Original plot

2. Deadly monsters

3. Exciting locations

4. Chernobyl exclusion zone
